### 北斗の拳世紀末カードバトル伝説 - Hokuto no Ken Card Battle Deck: Amiba Starter Deck
3 [HnK1-58] Amiba
1 [HnK1-63] Toki (Amiba)
2 [HnK1-79] Amiba Style Hokuto Shinken
3 [HnK1-24] Toki (Child)
2 [HnK1-66] Ganzan Ryozanha
2 [HnK1-70] Hokuto Ujō Hagan Ken
2 [HnK1-71] Nanto Hakuro Ken
2 [HnK1-13] Toki
1 [HnK1-45] Jagi
3 [HnK1-49] Diamond
3 [HnK1-50] Club
3 [HnK1-52] Mad Sergeant
3 [HnK1-60] Galf
